column3:
What we're about 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 You practice German, English or any other language? Or just want to Socialise & Meet new People?

You found the right group! We have every day of the week events in a nice and relaxed atmosphere. All meetups are open for everyone no matter your language level. Native speakers are welcome too of course!

You can also come by to Socialise and meet new friends and like minded people.

Enjoy your time

Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/viaNumo/

Looking for More German Events? join our second meetup Group https://www.meetup.com/viaNumoDE/
